span.span: Update on Flexible Learning/E-Learning Days 2019-2020 School Year

p.span: Earlier in the school year, I sent a message letting you know that we were working to reduce or...

a.style: font-size:11px; font-weight:bold; color:#777; display:inline-block;background:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);color:#ffffff;border:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) solid 1px; padding: 0 5px;
a.title: Update on Flexible Learning/E-Learning Days 2019-2020 School Year

div.p: You likely have heard that Governor Tim Walz issued an order that distance learning will remain in place for the remainder of the school year. Friday May 1st and Monday May 4th will remain as “non- student contact days” where no new material will be delivered. Staff will utilize those two days to plan for the remainder of the year.
